General.Name: Sky Harbour Group Corp
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Sky Harbour Group Corporation operates as an aviation infrastructure development company in the United States. It develops, leases, and manages general aviation hangars for business aircraft. The company was incorporated in 2017 and is based in White Plains, New York.
General.Address: Westchester County Airport, White Plains, NY, United States, 10604
